programlisting:
# Hostname and port of guacamole proxy guacd-hostname: localhost guacd-port: 4822
# Location to read extra .jar's from lib-directory: /var/lib/guacamole/classpath
# Auth provider class (authenticates user/pass combination, needed if using the provided login screen) auth-provider: net.sourceforge.guacamole.net.basic.BasicFileAuthenticationProvider basic-user-mapping: /etc/guacamole/user-mapping.xml
